param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Control Frequency
param.desc: Control frequency (< 0 for event-driven EstimatedState processing)

param.name: Along-track -- Minimum Yaw
param.desc: Minimum yaw speed for track bearing convergence

param.name: Cross-track -- Distance Limit
param.desc: Distance threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Cross-track -- Time Limit
param.desc: Time threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Position Jump Threshold
param.desc: Threshold for a jump in EstimatedState to turn monitors off

param.name: Position Jump Time Factor
param.desc: Relation between monitor disabling time and position jump

param.name: Bottom Track -- Enabled
param.desc: Enable or disable bottom track control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Forward Samples
param.desc: Number of samples for forward range moving average

param.name: Bottom Track -- Safe Pitch
param.desc: Safe pitch angle to perform bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Slope Hysteresis
param.desc: Slope hysteresis when recovering from avoidance

param.name: Bottom Track -- Minimum Altitude
param.desc: Minimum admissible altitude for bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Minimum Range
param.desc: Minimum admissible forward range for bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Altitude Tolerance
param.desc: Altitude tolerance below which altitude is ignored

param.name: Bottom Track -- Depth Tolerance
param.desc: Depth tolerance below which altitude is ignored

param.name: Bottom Track -- Check Trend
param.desc: Check slope angle trend in unsafe state

param.name: Bottom Track -- Depth Avoidance
param.desc: Enable or disable obstacle avoidance during depth control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Admissible Altitude
param.desc: Admissible altitude when doing depth control

param.name: Filter EstimatedState
param.desc: Enable or disable EstimateState filtering by entity

param.name: Filter Entity
param.desc: Only accepts EstimatedState from this entity

param.name: Maximum Bank
param.desc: Limit for absolute value of output bank angle reference

param.name: Loitering Radius
param.desc: Radius of loitering circle after arriving at destination

param.name: Default Speed
param.desc: Speed to use in case no speed is given by reference source.

param.name: Default Speed Units
param.desc: Units to use for default speed (one of 'm/s', 'rpm' or '%').

param.name: Default Z
param.desc: Default z when no vertical reference is given.

param.name: Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Commands source
param.desc: List of <Command>:<System>+<System>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source systems and entities allowed to pass a specific command.

param.name: Control Frequency
param.desc: Frequency of simulated vehicles control execution.

param.name: Formation Longitudinal Gain
param.desc: Trajectory gain over the vehicle longitudinal direction

param.name: Formation Lateral Gain
param.desc: Trajectory gain over the vehicle lateral direction

param.name: Formation Boundary Layer
param.desc: Control sliding surface boundary layer thickness

param.name: Flow Switching Gain
param.desc: Maximum fluid flow acceleration at aircraft location. Switching gain for the worst case scenario.

param.name: Formation Leader Gain
param.desc: Leader control importance gain (relative to the sum of every other formation vehicle)

param.name: Formation Deconfliction Gain
param.desc: Individual vehicle importance gain (relative to the leader)

param.name: Formation Reference Frame
param.desc: Formation Reference Frame (0 - Earth; 1 - Path (no curvature); 2 - Path (with curvature)

param.name: Vehicle List
param.desc: System ID list of the formation vehicles.

param.name: Speed Time Constant
param.desc: Speed controller first order time constant. Inverse of the speed rate gain to simulate speed dynamics

param.name: Bank Time Constant
param.desc: Bank controller first order time constant. Inverse of the bank rate gain to simulate bank dynamics

param.name: Altitude Time Constant
param.desc: Altitude controller first order time constant. Inverse of the vertical rate gain to simulate altitude dynamics

param.name: Bank Rate Limit
param.desc: Bank rate limit to simulate bank dynamics

param.name: Vertical Slope Limit
param.desc: Vertical slope limit to simulate altitude dynamics

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: CPU - Moving Average Samples
param.desc: Number of moving average samples to smooth CPU usage

param.name: CPU - Maximum Usage
param.desc: Maximum CPU usage. When this value is hit an error will be raised

param.name: Minimum GPS Fixes
param.desc: Minimum number of GPS fixes required to compute the clock offset

param.name: Maximum Clock Offset
param.desc: Maximum Clock Offset. If the clock offset is above this value the clock will be syncronized

param.name: Boot Synchronization Timeout
param.desc: At boot the system tries to synchronize clocks. It continues unsynched after timeout

param.name: Hardware Clock Synchronization Command
param.desc: System command to execute everytime the clock is synchronized

param.name: Report Timeout
param.desc: Timeout threshold to report Entity error

param.name: Default Monitoring -- Hardware
param.desc: Additional default entities to monitor in Hardware profile

param.name: Maximum Consecutive Transitions
param.desc: Maximum number of consecutive transitions before starting to ignore

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Initialization Time
param.desc: Time to wait at beginning before assessing vehicle medium

param.name: Wet Data Timeout
param.desc: No valid wet sensor data timeout

param.name: Wet Data Threshold
param.desc: No valid wet sensor data threshold value

param.name: Underwater Depth Threshold
param.desc: Minimum depth necessary to consider a vehicle underwater

param.name: Air Speed Threshold
param.desc: Minimum air speed necessary to consider a vehicle in air

param.name: Entity Label - Medium Sensor
param.desc: Entity label of 'EntityState' Medium Sensor messages

param.name: Compute Progress
param.desc: True if plan progress should be computed

param.name: RPM Conversion Factor
param.desc: Factor to convert from RPMs to meters per second

param.name: Actuation Conversion Factor
param.desc: Factor to convert from actuation to meters per second

param.name: Abort On Failed Activation
param.desc: Abort when a payload fails to activate

param.name: Dive depth
param.desc: Depth to dive in response to 'dive' command

param.name: Traveling depth
param.desc: Depth to use when traveling (Goto maneuvers)

param.name: Dive seconds
param.desc: Time to be under water in response to 'dive' command (seconds)

param.name: Loiter radius
param.desc: Radius of generated loiter and station keeping maneuvers

param.name: RPM Speed
param.desc: Speed in RPMs to be used in the generated maneuvers

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Lost Comms Plan
param.desc: Plan to be executed in case of Lost Communications

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Safe Entities
param.desc: Relevant entities when performing a safe plan

param.name: Allows External Control
param.desc: Allow for the vehicle to be externally controlled

param.name: Maneuver Handling Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for starting or stopping a maneuver

param.name: Ignored Interfaces
param.desc: List of interfaces whose services will not be announced

param.name: Loading Order
param.desc: List of messages ordered by loading order

param.name: Reception timeout
param.desc: Maximum amount of seconds to wait for missing fragments in incoming messages

param.name: Transports
param.default: Voltage, Current, FuelLevel, GpsFix, EntityState, CpuUsage, StorageUsage, Heartbeat, Temperature, RSSI, LinkLevel

param.name: Flush Interval
param.desc: Number of second to wait before forcing data to be written to disk

param.name: Local Port
param.desc: Local UDP port to listen on

param.name: Static Destinations
param.desc: List of <IPv4>:<Port> destinations that will always receive outgoing messages

param.name: Rate Limiters
param.default: CpuUsage:0.2, EntityState:1, EstimatedState:5, FormationEval:1, FuelLevel:0.1, SimulatedState:0.5, StorageUsage:0.05, Temperature:0.1

param.name: Filtered Entities
param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Announce this transport to services or not

param.name: Underwater Communications
param.desc: Allow underwater communication when limited comms are being simulated

param.name: Always Transmitted Messages
param.desc: List of messages that will always be transmitted disregarding communication limitations

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed
